classes.description: Knowledge base for RAG containing technical documentation, project guides, and structured content.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the document, section, or heading related to this chunk.

properties.name: document_id
properties.description: Stable ID referencing the source document this chunk belongs to.

properties.name: chunk_id
properties.description: Sequential ID for reordering chunks from the same document.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Section or subheading where this chunk was extracted.

properties.name: folder_path
properties.description: Folder path where the document was located.

properties.name: source_type
properties.description: Source file type (pdf, md, docx, txt, etc.).

properties.name: last_modified
properties.description: Last modified timestamp of the original file.

properties.name: indexed_at
properties.description: Timestamp when this chunk was added or updated in the vector DB.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: List of topic tags or custom metadata added during ingestion.

properties.name: category
properties.description: High-level document classification (architecture, devops, finance, etc.).

properties.name: hash
properties.description: Hash of the chunk text used for detecting changes and preventing duplicates.

properties.name: pipeline_version
properties.description: Version of the ingestion pipeline that processed this chunk.
